name: "Legendary" Backpack Buckle Prong
description: <c=@Flavor>The remaining pieces are nowhere to be found.</c>

name: Confidential Forgotten Letter
description: A secret letter for Aisha Jedgok, who is undercover among the ghosts of the Lair of the Forgotten.

name: Warbeast Hardened Boot Upper
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Boots.

name: Mini Soldier
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Shorewatcher Salomon
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Sagal's Riding Boots of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Threat Report: Lost Scouts
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Rampager's Green Wood Staff of Smoldering
24-Slot Gossamer Saddlebag
description: 24 Slots

name: Dwarven Axe Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Carrion Winged Tunic of the Necromancer
Branded Spire
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Imann's Grateful Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Elonian Leg Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Leggings
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Black Lion Commemorative Sprocket
description: Double-click to exchange for Living World Season 1 items.

name: Mini Goddess Kormir
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Collector's Edition Sandstorm
description: Double-click to open a direct link to the Grand Sahil Casino so you can purchase Sandstorm orbs.

name: Recipe: Brandspark Earring
description: A recipe to make a Brandspark Earring.

name: Knight's Winged Pants of the Mesmer
Jackal Treat
description:
A nutritious and magic-imbued snack made specially for jackals! Double-click to feed this to your jackal.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.

name: Lentil-Like Stone
description: Utterly inedible.

name: Garden of the Gods
description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

name: Royal Funerary Legging Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Recipe: Mordant Bonespitter
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Bonespitter recipe.

name: Mini Aqua Stalker
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Blessing of Courage
description: Double-click to gain a reward.

name: Marshal's Elonian Breastplate
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Rampager's Rascal Coat of the Thief
Searing Girdle of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Ogre Supply Case
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ollgi in Lommuld Kraal.

name: Dwarven Hammer Rune
description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

name: Lost Emerald
description:
This item only has value as part of a collection and can be consumed without preventing progress.

<c=@Flavor>This beautiful gemstone shines with intensity.</c>

name: Monocle
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current helm. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Late-Blooming Elon Lily
description: Double-click to turn 10 Late-Blooming Elon Lilies into a Florid Bouquet.

name: Mini Yellow Catmander
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Seaswept Pyxis
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Sunset Jewel
description: A recipe to make a Sunset Jewel, used in Elonian jewelcrafting.

name: Pyre Gall
description: Double-click to open.

name: Awakened Tar Drip
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Superior Sigil of Severance
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Upon interrupting an enemy, gain up to 250 precision and ferocity for 4 seconds, depending on level. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 second)</c>

name: Barrel of Jahin White
description: <c=@Flavor>This wine, brewed with grapes grown in the Hanging Gardens, is often gifted back and forth between great families during marriages and other celebrations.</c>

name: Dreaded Banners of King Palawa Joko I (Infused)
Mini Cavalier Heroine
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: 24-Slot Nomad's Locker
description: 24 slots. If possible, weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Chest of the Elon Riverlands Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 10 Trade Contracts, and 1 Scrap of Desert Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Garden of the Gods Page 04
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Dwarven Shield Back
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Carrion Green Wood Focus of Rage
Banur, Who Targets the Just of Severance
Cowrie League Caravan's Scales
description: <c=@Flavor>Whether you deal in salt, gold, or mithril, the Cowrie League's scales are trusted throughout Elona.</c>

name: Carrion Green Wood Trident of Torment
Book of Awakening to Light
description:
Read this tome to gain access to a rare set of collections.
<c=@Flavor> This ancient tome describes Primeval burial rites, performed under the care of a Primeval Steward.</c>

name: Statue of Joko Smiting Abaddon
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>The statue, like the story it tells, is hollow and underwhelming.</c>

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Legging Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Leggings.

name: Sama, Profane the Wondrous of Severance
Garden of the Gods Page 06
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: 28-Slot Marshal's Saddlebag
description: 28 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Handmade Crab-Catching Basket
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Ingenious construction causes this basket to provide the fishing village with a steady supply of delicious food for themselves and their raptors.</c>

name: Rampager's Flame Eye of the Elementalist
Dwarven Shield Boss
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Elonian Snake Statue
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Deputy Ayoub
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Rabid Tempered Scale Legs of the Revenant
24-Slot Marshal's Pannier
description: 24 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Boots
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Recipe: Cup of Light-Roasted Coffee
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Cup of Light-Roasted Coffee.

name: Order of Whispers Mission Dispatches
description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

name: Sagal's Cataphract Guard of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Strange Pellet of Bones and Fur
description: <c=@Flavor>What's so large that it could swallow the bones in this regurgitated mass? Perhaps the beastmaster at the Menagerie knows more. Double-click to view location.</c>

name: Springer Treat
description:
Filled with all the nutrients a growing springer needs! Double-click to feed this to your springer.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Weaver
Attuned Gift of the Hidden Scion (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Sunset Jewel
description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

buff.description:
+17 Power
+17 Healing Power
+9 Condition Damage
+9 Precision

name: Mini Sunspear Tarik
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Sulfuric Sample
description: A sample of sulfuric sands that the djinn will find useful for their research.

name: Sandstorm Trump Hand
description: Double-click to open your prize and gain special rewards and valuable junk items in random amounts.

name: Bottle of Choya...Perfume?
description: Follow your nose.

name: Sagal's Jousting Halter of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Helm
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Mini Master Sergeant Shadi
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Warbeast Hardened Helmet Padding
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Helms.

name: Mini Awakened Villager
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Threat Report: Elemental Confluences
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Gloves
description: A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Gloves.

name: Elonian Gong
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Winged Frame
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The Sunspear banner remains a symbol of heroism and unity.</c>

name: Icon of the Goddess
description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

name: Recipe Desert: Pile of Jacarandere
description: Recipe Desert Unlock: Double-click to unlock the recipe for Pile of Jacarandere.

name: Stained Tent Canvas
description: <c=@Flavor>Cheap and simple to set up, but for many, the only shelter in these dangerous lands.</c>

name: Page of Spearmarshal Glove Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Gloves. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Coat Lining
description: Used to craft Gossamer Coats.

name: Mini Sand Shark
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Rampager's Winged Pants of the Elementalist
Threat: Zelke the Shameless
description:
Double-click to gain a large amount of bonus Mastery experience.
<c=@Flavor>Help Amnoon remain safe and independent by taking out notable threats.</c>

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Shoulderpads
description: A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Shoulderpads.

name: Knight's Harlequin's Mask of the Mesmer
Sagal's Dusty Crown of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Dwarven Axe Grip
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Brightwater Supply Crate
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ket'abatchk at Brightwater Inlet.

name: Carrion Green Wood Staff of Torment
Tale of Plenty
description:
Trade this with the traveling historian, Elisa.
<c=@Flavor>It takes hard work and ingenuity to make life thrive out here. But we did it for centuries, and no mere rampaging god or despot will stop our people.</c>

name: Scarlet's Rainbow
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Mini Elonian Mime
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Sunspear Saita
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: House of Daoud Trophy Crate
description:
Can contain totems, dust, fossils, or thorns.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Cavalier Squire's Kit
description: Double-click to open.

name: The Spearmarshal's Gift
description:
Open to choose a new weapon skin to unlock for your account.
<c=@Flavor>A gift from a friend, in hope that you will carry on our struggle.</c>

name: Mystery Quaggan Tonic
description: The aroma of sea breezes and simpler times wafts from the bottle. Use its contents to transform into...something.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 10
Amnoon Numismatic Catalogue
description: <c=@Flavor>Useful to collectors and traders alike, this catalogue shows coins from ancient to modern.</c>

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Boots
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Boots recipe.

name: Sagal's Raptor-Handling Gloves of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: 28-Slot Hamaseen Pannier
description: 28 slots. If possible, junk items will fill this box first before other empty slots. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Recipes of the Dwarven Cloth Trader
description: Double-click to learn a set of Tailoring recipes for crafting 24-slot bags.

name: Radiant Charge
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The Sunspear banner remains a symbol of heroism and unity.</c>

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Gloves
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Shadi's Sword
description: Shadi's missing sword.

name: Choya Spine
description:
Drops from Choya in the Crystal Desert.

<c=@Flavor>Used in cooking and medicine, once sterilized and cleaned up a bit.</c>

name: Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I Page 06
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Thrasher
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear thrasher recipe.

name: Blessing of Judgment
description: Double-click to gain a reward.

name: Order of Shadows Seal
description:
Redeem at a Shadows handler after successful field order deliveries or for renown with Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
<c=@Flavor>Proof of service to the Order of Shadows.</c>

name: Guardian Sunspear Statue
description: This item only has value when part of a collection.

name: Haresfoot Herb
description: A rare herb used by the local nomadic tribes. Perhaps a nomad merchant could make some use of this.

name: Luminous Saber
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Giant Bangle
description:
Grants a moderate amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>The bangle is both large and said to be excellent at distracting the giants that roam the Highlands. </c>

name: Chest of the Third Room
description: Double-click to open.

name: Dwarven Hammer Shaft
description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.
